lines.text: You wanna be a wiseguy, Alby?
The fuckin' Chinese blew up half the block tonight.
Don't fuck with the Chinese, Alby. They'll fucking kill you.
Mind your business!

We must never allow ourselves to be divided by war... or to be interfered with by police investigations... all because a few reckless children cannot live within our tradition of our society. Our responsibility is to control our children.
You should have helped me. We could have settle our differences afterwards.
I warned you not to cross "uncles", what did you expect?
I expected my cousin to fight by my side man. I expected you to help me.
You knew I couldn't.
No I didn't. I didn't want to fight the whole world man, I just wanted a piece of the action. We are poor Chinese kids. We got no one to help us.
We got to get out of here. We'll go back to Hong Kong.
Gung Tu would never forgive you.
It doesn't matter anymore.

[talking to a elderly Chinese man]
Hey chopsticks, that's your daughter? Real pretty lookin' chink! ha-ha
Shut the fuck up Mercury!
What?
You heard what I said. Shut the fuck up.
Hey, you don't like it you go over to the 'chink' booth. How about that?
They ain't 'chinks', they're people man.
They're people huh? Then why don't you take a look and see what these "people" did to your family store, how about that?
And what "people" did this to my brother?
Hey Alby! What's this kid whacked on? Somebody better talk to him.
Who? Somebody like you?
What is this?
Don't look at my brother! I'm talking to you!
You making a big mistake , little boy.
That's okay you fucking piece of shit!

[Mercury starts to manhandle Tony and Alby breaks it up]
Hey! hey! What is wrong with you?
Hey ,I'm alright. take him home! Take "Ghandi" home! Take this "chink" lover home! Go Ahead! Put him to bed. Goodnight "Ghandi"!
What's the matter with you? Fighting with your friends over nothin'?
He ain't my friend.
Well he's my friend!
He just gets me mad with all that shit about the Chinese.
What do you mean?
It gets on my nerves.
Since when are you so sensitive about the Chinese?
I ain't , it just bothers me alrite?
Why is that?
It just does!
you not answering my question.
What do you want from me Alby, huh? I'm sick and tired of his shit! He's a fucking asshole!
Whoa, whoa! What's wrong with you? Huh? These are our friends. You were born in this neighborhood. Don't you forget that.
Hey "Romeo", what's that on your face?
Shit, it's too hot for you Mercury.
Hey you look good with that cotex on your nose. Why don't you run across the street and have the "fish-head" take your picture.
I'll tell you now Tony. I catch in that fuckin' neighborhood again, I swear to Christ I'll smack the shit out of you. You understand me?
I told you I wasn't in their neighborhood Alby.
How many times I gotta tell you to stay away from these people. They are nothing but trouble. huh?
People? They don't even look human.
Look at 'em. Have you ever seen one without a camera in their hand? Ha ha.
Do you notice that they are squinting even when it's cloudy?
Thank God I'm not stupid like you guys.
